Eternal Love

In Your Eyes

In your eyes, I found my galaxy,
Stars dancing with pure ecstasy.
Every glance, a shooting star,
Reminding me how blessed we are.

Soul's Dance

Ishu, my heart's eternal flame,
Since first I whispered your sweet name.
Like moon and tide, we're meant to be,
Two souls in perfect harmony.

Love's Garden

In love's garden, Ishu dear,
Our bond grows stronger year by year.
Each moment spent in your embrace,
Fills my world with endless grace.

Eternal Spring

With you, Ishu, life's always spring,
Your love makes my spirit sing.
In winter's cold or summer's heat,
Our hearts in perfect rhythm beat.

Ocean Deep

My love for you, dear Ishu, flows,
Deep as oceans, pure as snow.
No measure vast enough to show,
The depths of love I've come to know.

Sacred Bond

Written in the stars above,
Ishu, you're my sacred love.
Every breath and heartbeat true,
Eternally belongs to you.

Love's Light

In darkness deep or morning bright,
Ishu, you're my guiding light.
A flame that burns with steady glow,
The purest love one heart could know.

Timeless

Time may flow like river's stream,
But you, Ishu, remain my dream.
Years may pass like autumn leaves,
Our love eternal never leaves.

Soul's Mirror

In your smile, I see my soul,
Two halves that make one perfect whole.
Ishu, in you my heart finds peace,
A love that time cannot decrease.

Divine Love

Heaven sent an angel rare,
Ishu, love beyond compare.
In this life and after too,
My heart beats only, dear, for you.
